functions.name: Sqrt
functions.description: Computes the square root of a number.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number to compute the square root for.

errors.message: The parameter must be a number.

functions.name: SqrtTable
functions.description: Computes the square root of each number in a table.

parameters.name: E
parameters.description: The table of numbers to compute the square root for.

errors.message: The parameter must be a table.
